_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:46:43 using v2.1
title: What are patients' overall experiences of their GP surgeries?
analysis_commentary: The majority of respondents to the GP patient survey have said overall their experiences of their GP surgeries were good; 87% of patients said their experiences were either very or fairly good in 2012/2013 although there was a slight decrease in 2012/2013 from the previous year. This decrease was only 1.5% of respondents to the question but this translates to almost 70,000 patients.
